articles.title: Trump's ceasefire pivot will have caused dismay in Kyiv - BBC
articles.description: The US president demanded a ceasefire before he met Putin. His change of mind flies in the face of what Europe and Ukraine want.
articles.content:
Paul AdamsBBC Diplomatic Correspondent
No deal in Alaska. It was always the most likely and, in the absence of Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, perhaps the most desirable outcome.
But US Pre… [+6454 chars]
